AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0818
INSTALL_MSG:
Enjoy converting between timezones!
You can add aliases for timezones which aren't official if needed.
NAME: TimezoneConversion
SHORT: Convert time between timezones or get the current time in a timezone
DESCRIPTION: Convert time between timezones or get the current time in a timezone. Allows the creation of aliases for timezones which aren't official
